name: maxmaschen2009
bio: Hi, I'm Max Maschen, I live in Block County and I'd love to make friends.
messages: I WAS HERE!! YOU GOT THIS DUDE ONE MORE PARRY!!!!!
NO WAIT NOOOO DAMMIT NO-- YES!!!!!
GOD I'M SO HAPPY I WITNESSED THIS
If anyone in chat goes to North Gardens school I'll be by the swings during recess tomorrow if you wanna watch tomorrow's stream together!!!
appeal_message: I don't even understand why I was banned. I really love your streams and I even used my free subscription on you. I'm really disappointed and hope you will unban me. Thank you, love Max Meschen
